original_text: And all the land wept aloud as all the people passed by, and the king crossed the brook Kidron, and all the people passed on toward the wilderness.
korean_text: 온 땅 사람이 큰 소리로 울며 모든 백성이 앞서 건너가매 왕도 기드론 시내를 건너가니 건너간 모든 백성이 광야 길로 향하니라

sentences.original_text: And all the land wept aloud
as all the people passed by
and the king crossed the brook Kidron
and all the people passed on toward the wilderness
